result.value: VIP is a flexible human variant interpretation pipeline for rare disease using state-of-the-art pathogenicity prediction ([CAPICE](https://github.com/molgenis/capice)) and template-based interactive reporting to facilitate decision support.
VIP documentation is available at this link https://molgenis.github.io/vip/. > [!TIP] > Visit https://vip.molgeniscloud.org/ to analyse your own variants > [!TIP] > Preprint now available at medRxiv

# Installation
```bash
git clone https://github.com/molgenis/vip
bash vip/install.sh
```

To create the documentation pages:
```
pip install mkdocs mkdocs-mermaid2-plugin
mkdocs serve
```

result.description:
## What's Changed
* Fix #632 .cram not published in fastq workflow by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/633
* Fix #634 Sex not passed to Straglr by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/635
* Use <CNV:TR> instead of <STR[num]> to enable VEP annotations & fix unknown sample sex Straglr error by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/636
* update inheritance matcher 3.1.1 to fix MT and YL inheritance matching by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/637


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/molgenis/vip/compare/v7.9.0...v7.9.1
result.name: v7.9.1

result.description:
## What's Changed
* update NXF_JVM_ARGS: change -Xmx250m to -Xmx512m by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/619
* update fastq config: set 'filter_reads' cpus to 1 by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/618
* Bump vip report to v7.0.0 (add sample tree to report) by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/622
* fix test.sh runner: fail on 'TIMEOUT' state by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/623
* FASTQ workflow parallelization improvements by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/620
* Add "pcr_performed" param to disable incompatible tools by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/621
* Fix GADO not working with certain hpo / proband combinations by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/626
* Filter called variants by user specified bed file by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/627
* Add Spectre CNV calling by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/625
* Remove DP filter from sample decision tree by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/629
* Bump vip version to 7.9.0 by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/630


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/molgenis/vip/compare/v7.8.0...v7.9.0
result.name: v7.9.0

result.description:
## What's Changed
* Support Nanopore adaptive sampling by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/613
* Produce CRAM coverage and read depth intermediate outputs by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/605
* Add Green-DB annotations (academic use only, disabled by default) by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/602
* Update gnomAD v4.0 to v4.1 by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/600
* Update VKGL 2024-02 to 2024-04  by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/608
* Update ClinVar 2024-03-17 to 2024-06-03 by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/608
* Update vip-report 6.0.2 to 6.1.0 by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/616
* Update Nextflow 23.10.0 to 24.04.2 by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/607
* Add `vkgl_vus` test by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/603
* Fix gnomAD VEP plugin: gnomAD_QC can be incorrect by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/601
* Fix GADO not executed when no proband column provided by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/598
* Fix null exception when no HPO provided by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/599
* Fix #609 Report job can run out of memory by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/610
* Fix #611 DeepVariant hangs in rare cases by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/612
* Update default process values for deepvariant_call_duo/trio by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/617

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/molgenis/vip/compare/v7.7.1...v7.8.0

* Update minimap 2.26 -> 2.27 + update preset by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/578

* Update GADO and HPO to v2024-02-08 by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/585
* Update ClinVar and update CAPICE model to v5.1.2-v2 by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/586

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/molgenis/vip/compare/v7.5.0...v7.6.0

result.description:
## What's Changed
* Fix incorrect ALT allele order after BCFtools merge by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/568
* Limit memory used by driver job by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/569
* Fix install script for cases that nextflow already exists by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/570
* Remove VEP workaround for custom bigwig annotation by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/571
* Add FAQ for missing read coverage for SV's by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/572
* Remove support for decision tree labels by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/573
* Fix: Only run CAPICE if there are variants to do predictions on by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/574
* Add ReMM and FATHMM-MKL-NC by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/575
* Remove broken link in documentation by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/576


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/molgenis/vip/compare/v7.4.0...v7.5.0
result.name: v7.5.0

result.description:
## What's Changed
* feat:add vip.sh -v, --version by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/554
* Add md5sum for all tests by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/555
* Bump VEP(111) and ClinVar by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/556
* Params to customize classification and reporting metadata by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/557
* Update key_features.md by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/559
* Fix: ncER score can be undefined causing warnings in the VEP plugin by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/560
* change tree order to `filter->vkgl->clinvar->gene->chrom` by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/558
* Fix plugins for features that do not support transcript by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/561
* Update capice to 5.1.2 by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/562
* Update decision tree image by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/564
* Chore/report601 by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/565
* Reduce memory needed for picard liftover by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/563


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/molgenis/vip/compare/v7.3.0...v7.4.0
result.name: v7.4.0

result.description:
## What's Changed
* Re-enable long read alignment in report by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/544
* 'multiple VIP' installer utility script by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/545
* Bump vcf-report 5.8.0 to 5.8.1 by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/546

result.description:
## What's Changed
* FASTQ quality check and filtering by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/536
* Installer improvements by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/540
  * Host all files in one place / do not rely on files hosted by third parties
  * Verify checksums of downloaded files
  * Option to host files on your own server
* Add hint to 'samples from different family' error by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/537
* Fix Java memory usage by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/538
* Workaround for Expansionhunter output missing SVTYPE by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/539
* Fix #336 build.sh only works if ran from script directory by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/542
* Fix cuteSV workaround by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/541


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/molgenis/vip/compare/v7.1.0...v7.2.0
result.name: v7.2.0

result.description:
## What's Changed
* Support GRCh37 and T2T inputs via liftover by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/529
* gnomAD v4 by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/534
* Improved inheritance match annotations and reporting by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/535
* Classify and filter short tandem repeat variants by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/524
* Fix: crams not reaching the report by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/526
* Fix: update (variant) feature types in annotation plugins by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/525
* Fix: normalize concatted gvcf to remove duplicates by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/528
* Fix: bcftools sort --max-mem values by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/532
* Fix: reintroduce cuteSV workaround by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/533



**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/molgenis/vip/compare/v7.0.0...v7.1.0
result.name: v7.1.0

result.description:

result.description:
## What's Changed
* Parallel fastq processing by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/498
* ncER annotations by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/504

* Bump inheritance matcher 2.1.8 to 2.1.9 by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/520
* Add `glnexus.WES` preset `DeepVariantWES_MED_DP` by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/506
* Remove `glnexus.WGS` preset `DeepVariantWES` by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/506

result.description:

* Manta joint SV calling by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/493

* Run GADO once per project by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/487
* Test runner: caching, parallelization, test selection, GIAB test cases by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/488 and https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/494 and https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/473
* Update annotation documentation by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/502
* Util scripts: create reference sequence mmi by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/492

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/molgenis/vip/compare/v6.1.1...v6.2.0

result.description:
## What's Changed
* Fix create_inheritance.sh: update incomplete penetrance file path by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/464
* Fix: gvcf workflow results might be invalid for multi-sample projects by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/465

result.name: v6.0.1

result.description:
## What's Changed

### New Features
* Short tandem repeat annotation for both [short-read](https://github.com/Clinical-Genomics/stranger) and [long-read](https://github.com/philres/straglr) sequencing data
* [AlphScore](https://doi.org/10.1093/bioinformatics/btad280): AlphaFold2-based pathogenicity prediction score annotation for missense variants
* genomic vcf workflow `gvcf`
* Update vcf-inheritance-matcher 2.1.6 to 2.1.8 (see [here](https://github.com/molgenis/vip-inheritance-matcher/releases))
  * Set inheritance match to 'missing' instead of '0' if gene inheritance patterns are unknown
  * Use only blood relatives in inheritance matching
* Update vcf-report 5.5.2 to 5.6.0  (see [here](https://github.com/molgenis/vip-report/releases))
  * Fix GADO default HC filter in default report template
  * Improved inheritance filters in default report template
* Update vcf-decision-tree-3.5.4 to 3.7.0 (see [here](https://github.com/molgenis/vip-decision-tree/releases))
  * Enable use of GADO and AlphScore fields in classification tree
* Restart Slurm process on certain errors
* Support `.sam` input in addition to `.bam` and `.cram`
* Validate input .vcf and .g.vcf contents
* Update VKGL annotations to 20230401 to 20230701
* Update ClinVar annotations 20230604 to 20230910
* Update HPO ontology to 20230822
* Update Clair3 v1.0.2 to v1.0.4 (see [here](https://github.com/HKU-BAL/Clair3/releases))
* Update minimap2 2.24 to 2.26 (see [here](https://github.com/lh3/minimap2/releases))
* Enable minimap2 soft-clipping

### Bug Fixes 
* Fix #405 Error if .cram doesn't contain reads for a chunk
* Fix #418 Multi-project handling of probands, HPO terms and pedigree
* Fix #419 Multi-project slice called too many times
* Fix #423 SV calling cannot detect translocations due to chunking
* Fix #428 Project samples can have different assembly and sequencing_method
* Fix #430 Variant calling can fail due to cram-to-bam slice-and-convert issue
* Fix #435 Succesfull pipeline execution if `individual_id` doesn't exist in VCF
* Fix #436 Input VCF index not created with HTSlib causes pipeline run failure
* Fix #437 Report can contain data of samples not in sample sheet
* Fix #439 cuteSV can fail based on ~ content on host machine
* Fix: GLnexus memory usage: stick to limits
* Fix: GADO uses same HPO as VIP
* Fix: do not mount apptainer home directory

### Breaking changes
* `vcf` workflow does not accept .g.vcf files, use new `gvcf` workflow instead, see [here](https://molgenis.github.io/vip/usage/command-line-options/)
* configuration changes, see [here](https://molgenis.github.io/vip/usage/config/) for new parameter names and process labels

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/molgenis/vip/compare/v5.8.2...v6.0.0
result.name: v6.0.0

result.description:
## What's Changed
* [GADO](https://www.genenetwork.nl/gado) predictions by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/412 and https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/421
* CAPICE pathogenicity prediction improvements using gnomAD HN by @SietsmaRJ in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/420
   * Default decision trees CAPICE thresholds updated, see [validation data](https://github.com/molgenis/capice-resources/tree/v5.1.0_model-v5.1.1-v1/validation/5.1.1/5.1.1-v1)
* Fixed report VCF download in case of missing sample values by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/422

* Automate documentation deployment by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/402, https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/403 and https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/407
* Add option to enable/disable crams in report by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/409

* Fix #391 concat_vcf input file name collision by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/392
* Change order of GnomadAF and AnnotSv in default tree by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/393
* Fix awk command in annotSV workaround by @bartcharbon in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/395
* Fix #389 samtools markdup can fail by @dennishendriksen in https://github.com/molgenis/vip/pull/396

result.value:
- [GNU-based Linux](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linux_distribution#Widely_used_GNU-based_or_GNU-compatible_distributions) (e.g. Ubuntu, [Windows Subsystem for Linux](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/wsl/about)) with [x86_64](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/X86-64) architecture
- Bash ≥ 3.2
- Java ≥ 11
- [Apptainer](https://apptainer.org/docs/admin/main/installation.html#install-from-pre-built-packages) (setuid installation)
- 8GB RAM (an estimate, see also the [documentation](https://molgenis.github.io/vip/get_started/requirements/))
- 220GB disk space

```bash
usage: vip -w <arg> -i <arg> -o <arg>
  -w, --workflow <arg>  workflow to execute. allowed values: cram, fastq, gvcf, vcf
  -i, --input    <arg>  path to sample sheet .tsv
  -o, --output   <arg>  output folder
  -c, --config   <arg>  path to additional nextflow .cfg (optional)
  -p, --profile  <arg>  nextflow configuration profile (optional)
  -r, --resume          resume execution using cached results (default: false)
  -s, --stub            quickly prototype workflow logic using process script stubs
  -h, --help            print this message and exit
```
